nodes.documentation:
@dev Base contract which controls accessibility for both the Maats Network
of stores and the stores themselves. This contract also implements an
emergency stop using pausible functions and methods to restrain access to
dangerous functions in the case of a malicious event. The puasable nature
of the contract is also important for implementing upgradeability.
nodes.name: StoreAccessControl

nodes.documentation: @dev Limit function access to the owner of the Maats Network
nodes.name: onlyMaatsOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Limit function access to only admins, owner NOT inclueded
nodes.name: onlyMaatsAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev Access provided to both the owner and the admins of the network
nodes.name: onlyMaatsLeadership

nodes.documentation: @dev Constructor simply sets the owner of Maats Network
@dev allow the current owner to transfer their ownership
nodes.name: setMaatsOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev used for testing to confimr that admins are infact added to array
nodes.name: getIsAdmin

nodes.documentation:
@dev Only the owner can create a new network admin. Require's that the
 address isn't already an admin and that it isn't equal to 0.
nodes.name: createMaatsAdmin
removeMaatsAdmin

nodes.documentation:
@dev Pull withdraw from contract. There isn't a payment method but doneations
 are accepted. Only the owner can withdraw the funds.
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev Modified version of OpenZeppelin's Pausable to match Maat's accessibility
 Pausable is used as to enable emergency stops as well as safe upgrading of contracts
nodes.name: Pause

nodes.documentation:
@dev Controls functions to ensure they can't be accessed if the owner
 pauses the contract.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Certain functions should only be accessible when the contract is paused
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Only the owner can pause the contract when it isn't already paused
nodes.name: _pause

nodes.documentation: @dev Only the owner can unpause the contract when its currently paused.
nodes.name: _unpause
